comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Typo in caption, should be Betty Nansen. "Betty Nansen (née Betty Anna Maria Müller) (19 March 1873 – 15 March 1943[2]) was a Danish actress and theatre director of the theater that carries her name, the Betty Nansen Theatre" en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Betty_Nansen See article about her in the Ashland tidings., December 16, 1915, Page 8, col. 1.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: B-59: Thanks for catching the typo, and for providing more information about Nansen. We will add more details to this record.
